Title: Open Source Exchange Control Panel
Description: A project to work on the development of an open source control panel for Microsoft Exchange 2007 (and 2010). We aim to create a control panel to allow both business and host to provide a way for users to create and manage exchange accounts through a simple web interface.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A project to work on the development of an open source control panel for Microsoft Exchange 2007 (and 2010). We aim to create a control panel to allow both business and host to provide a way for users to create and manage exchange accounts through a simple web interface.

Get Involved

Sign up with codeplex and post your desired participation level, area of expertise, and any information relevant to the cause. We will send you a confirmation soon after. You may also contact the project owner through "codeplex contact feature".

We are looking for:

Developers
C# developers of all skill levels are welcome to participate.
Particular skills needed include PowerShell, WCF, asp.net, MVC and JQuery
Testers
People with Exchange systems available for testing, obviously not production systems!
Designers
UI for Front-End web application.
Technical Writers
